snippet: The Federal Trade Commission seeks stricter regulations, especially on disclosure of personal information, to keep pace with Internet technology.
abstract: Federal Trade Commission, seeking to further tighten rules on online collection or disclosure of children's personal information, proposes restrictive requirements on companies and Web sites that target youths or that have young audiences.
lead_paragraph: The Federal Trade Commission seeks stricter regulations, especially on disclosure of personal information, to keep pace with Internet technology.

headline.seo: F.T.C. Proposes Tighter Rules for Children’s Web Sites
headline.main: F.T.C. Seeks Tighter Rules on Web Sites for Children
headline.print_headline: F.T.C. Seeks Tighter Rules On Web Sites For Children
